scepter_desc: Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attack them for 7 seconds. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges
shard_desc: Counterspell passively grants a 900 radius aura that reduces enemy spell damage by 10%%. Reduces spell damage by an additional 20%% to enemies within 300 range

scepter_desc:
Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants Axe 7 armor per affected target. 

Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown by 3.
shard_desc: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff for 6s to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal 20% less total attack damage to Axe. Increases Counter Helix Chance by 10%.

scepter_desc: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by 45 seconds. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions takes 700%% incoming damage and immediately dies if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.
shard_desc: Causes Brain Sap to become a 550 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for 25%.

scepter_desc: Bloodseeker sprays his blood in an area paying with his blood to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased by 50%. Cannot be turned off while on Cooldown.
shard_desc: Bloodrage attacks now deal 2% of the targetâ€™s max health as pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

scepter_desc: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over a set amount of time.
shard_desc: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by %shard_bonus_explosion%%%.

scepter_desc: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.
shard_desc: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, reducing their regeneration by 10% per stack. Increases damage by 5 per stack. Lasts 7 seconds. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal 60 magic damage per stack and 40%% slow for 2 seconds to enemies within 650 radius. Max Stacks: 7

scepter_desc: Enchant Totem becomes a %distance_scepter% range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a 40%% cleave hit.
shard_desc: Reduces Fissure cooldown by 2 seconds and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for half the duration.

scepter_desc: Performs a mini Omnislash for a short duration.
shard_desc: Increases movement speed during Blade Fury by 100 and attacks a random nearby unit once per second dealing 75% damage.

scepter_desc: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies within 500 AoE along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second starfall that deals 50% damage to the impacted unit.
shard_desc: Grants +1 Leap Charge. Sagan pounces, dealing %aoe_damage% to every enemy in a forward cone within 500 range of the landing spot and slowing them by %aoe_slow%%% for %aoe_duration% seconds.

scepter_desc: Morphling steals stats from the replicated hero. If the replicated hero's primary attribute is Strength it will also steal Status Resistance, if it's Agility, it will steal Movement Speed and if it's Intelligence, it will steal Spell Amplification. Additionally reduces Replicate Cooldown by %scepter_cooldown_reduction% seconds.
shard_desc: Causes Adaptive Strike to have +1 Multishot and increases the stun duration by 1 second. Multishot prioritizes heroes.

scepter_desc: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.
shard_desc: Shadow Fiend gains 2 souls per kill. Additionally Shadow Fiend can consume 1 soul per attack to deal a 190% damage crit and fear the target for 0.3s. CD: 3s

scepter_desc: Adds Juxtapose active ability. Destroys Phantom Lancer's other juxtapose illusions and quickly creates the max illusions it allows with a bonus 10 seconds of duration. Increases Max Illusions by 2.
shard_desc: Spirit Lance bounces once on an enemy within 750 radius, prioritizing heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage by +40%%.

scepter_desc: Waning Rift now has 150 extra radius and range and knocks enemies back 400 distance over 0.5 seconds (non-interrupting). Reveals invisible enemy units and wards in the area for 5 seconds.
shard_desc: Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range + 200 every time it phase shifts.

scepter_desc:
Increases Rot radius by %scepter_rot_radius_bonus% and damage by %scepter_rot_damage_bonus%.

Reduces health regen on affected enemies by 25%%.
shard_desc: Allows targeting an ally to swallow them and heal them for %scepter_regen_pct%%% of their max health per second. Adds 300 Cast Range and reduces cooldown by 5 seconds.

scepter_desc: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.
shard_desc: Causes Storm Surge to have an 18% chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release forked lightning that strikes the target and up to 2 other enemies. Deals 150 Damage and slows them by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

scepter_desc: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by Sand King's Burrowstrike and increases its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.
shard_desc: Every 700 units moved causes an Epicenter Pulse around Sand King in 475 AoE. Increases Epicenter Pulse Damage by 20

scepter_desc: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.
shard_desc: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and allied heroes within 750 AoE of him 3 Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

scepter_desc: Increases cast range and transports Sven along the storm hammer. Storm Bolt also applies a Dispel on the target.
shard_desc: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants 5 armor to all allies within 1200 range of Sven

scepter_desc: Tiny channels this ability to throw random trees within range towards the targeted aoe. Deals Tiny's attack damage plus a bonus to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
shard_desc: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

scepter_desc: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes 100%% damage and can cast all of her spells. Illusion has 12%% movement speed bonus. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her.
shard_desc: Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes. Increases Cast Range by 100.

scepter_desc: Increases Windrun slow by 20% and makes it undispellable. Enemies affected by Windrun are blinded by %scepter_blind%%%
shard_desc: Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies within 1000 radius by %wind_strength% units per second in the target direction for 3 seconds. Vector Targeted. Cast Range: %abilitycastrange% Mana Cost: %abilitymanacost% Cooldown: %abilitycooldown%s

scepter_desc: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
shard_desc: Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to 9% of their current health.

scepter_desc: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area around Kunkka once every %torrent_interval% for %torrent_duration% seconds. Spawns within %torrent_max_distance% range of him.
shard_desc: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals %damage% damage and drags enemies along it for %knockback_distance% distance. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

scepter_desc: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.
shard_desc: Lina's spells deal 10 more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.

scepter_desc: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.
shard_desc: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to three enemies. You become Spell Immune while channeling.

scepter_desc: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.
shard_desc: Shackles creates 4 Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 125. Lasts 7 seconds.

scepter_desc: Whenever Slardar casts Slithereen Crush, he creates a puddle of water that is considered a river for movement and bonuses.
shard_desc: Causes Slithereen Crush to apply Corrosive Haze for 5 seconds to units affected. Increases radius by 75.

scepter_desc: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.
shard_desc: Increases Anchor Smash damage by 90 and causes it to affect buildings. Reduces cooldown by 1 second.

scepter_desc: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.
shard_desc: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward for 2 seconds. Death Ward has -30 Attack Speed. He is hidden during this time.

scepter_desc: Casts Sinister Gaze in a target area. Sinister Gaze lets you cast your other abilities while channeling it.
shard_desc:
Creates an icicle at the target spot for %duration% seconds, slowing enemies within %aura_radius% range by %bonus_movespeed%%%. Has 800 health.

Chain Frost can bounce to the Icicle if there are no other enemies in range.

Can cast Frost Shield on it.

scepter_desc: Increases cast range, number of attacks and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration. Hits 2 targets per attack.
shard_desc: Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep for %duration% seconds or if they take 200 damage. At the end of the duration, the target wakes up and takes %damage% damage, and is slowed by %movement_slow%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds. Cast Range: 1000

scepter_desc: Black Hole deals additional damage equivalent to 5% of the unit's Max Health per second.
shard_desc: Black Hole does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.

scepter_desc: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +200 cast range and reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by 10% (stacking) if it's a hero. The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.
shard_desc: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing %damage% damage, teleporting them %knockback_distance% units away and reducing their Cast and Attack Range by %range_reduction%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds

scepter_desc: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and disable the enemy target.
shard_desc: Grants Concussive Grenade. Deals 125 damage, knocking enemies back 475 distance, slowing them by 50%% and disarming them for 3 seconds. Radius: 375. Knocks you back 475 units on cast.

scepter_desc: Increases Heartstopper Aura damage while Ghost Shroud is active.
shard_desc: Spawns a fast moving large Death Pulse towards the target enemy or ally, causing the target to become ethereal for 2.5 seconds. Reduces enemy magic resistance by 25%. Spreads towards nearby enemies and allies after impact.

scepter_desc: Calls %number_of_golems_scepter% Golems with reduced stats and bounty.
shard_desc: Turns Shadow Word into a 450 AoE Spell. Grants 10%% movement speed bonus to allies and slows enemies by 10%%.

scepter_desc: Causes Wild Axes to have no cooldown and can be used again once they come back.
shard_desc: Reduces Hawk cooldown by 7 seconds. Hawks gains Dive Bomb. Channels for 1 second, revealing itself, and then flies towards the target enemy, dealing 250 damage and stunning them for 2 seconds, killing the hawk. Cast Range: 1200.

scepter_desc: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.
shard_desc: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals %shard_damage% damage in a 300 AoE and silences the target for %shard_duration% seconds.

scepter_desc: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.
shard_desc: Causes Venomous Gale to summon two Plague Wards when it impacts an enemy hero. Increases travel range by 400.

scepter_desc: Applies a Time Lock proc to all units at the landing destination.
shard_desc: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.

scepter_desc: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for %scepter_duration% seconds. Buffs the transformed units with +75 attack speed and +25%% movement speed.
shard_desc: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and spawn three skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.

scepter_desc: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for bonus its usual damage then return to her with life.
shard_desc: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by 1 and causes enemies to be feared for 2 seconds if they are siphoned for 3 seconds consecutively.

scepter_desc: Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Anytime Phantom Assassin gets a hero kill, her abilities are refreshed. Reduces Blur cooldown and increases Fade Time to 0.75.
shard_desc: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her in a 550 AoE, dealing 16% of a victim's max health on impact and applying break for 3 seconds.

scepter_desc: Removes cooldown and increases damage.
shard_desc: Life Drain can target your Nether Ward, causing life drain to refract to all enemy heroes within %abilitycastrange% units of the ward for 70% of its normal value. The effect is interrupted if the ward is destroyed. Additionally increases your Nether Ward Cast Range by 350

scepter_desc: Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling. Does not break Meld. Detonates the Psionic Trap on arrival.
shard_desc: Causes Psionic Traps to silence enemies for up to 3.5 seconds based on how long the trap has been charged. Increases max trap count by 4 and vision by 125.

scepter_desc: Decreases mana cost and cooldown. Increases cast range.
shard_desc: Causes Poison Attack to lower armor by 1 per stack and allows it to affect buildings for 40% poison damage. Increases max stacks by 3.

scepter_desc: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.
shard_desc: Allows Lucent beam to be ground targeted with a 325 target search radius. Also releases an attack on a random target within 500 range of the Lucent Beam and reduces mana cost by 50.

scepter_desc: Increases the level of Dragon Knight's ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount, 20% increased Magic Resistance and free pathing.
shard_desc: Ignites a %radius% AoE area for %duration% seconds, dealing %damage% damage per second that lingers for %linger_duration% seconds to enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.

scepter_desc: Good Juju reduces all item Cooldowns by %item_cooldown_reduction%%% and can be cast on an ally to refresh all item cooldowns.
shard_desc: Causes Poison Touch to hex affected targets for 1.25 seconds.

scepter_desc: Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.
shard_desc: Rises up, granting Clockwerk flying vision, flying movement, and a %bonus_speed%%% bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Lasts up to %duration% seconds or until he casts Hookshot.

scepter_desc: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies in %radius% AoE to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, causing them to take %magic_amp%%% more magic damage and be slowed by %slow%%% for %duration% seconds. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause you to take amplified damage.
shard_desc: Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location three additional times, with a 5 second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by 75. Split Earth echo location is visible to both teams.

scepter_desc: Lowers cooldown from 85 to 60. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from 2 up to 3.8 seconds at max bounce.
shard_desc: Causes the first two trees destroyed with Sprout to summon Greater Treants. Can only have two Greater Treants alive.

scepter_desc: Allows Infesting enemy heroes for 5 seconds, disarming them and attacking their insides once every 1.25 seconds and doubling Lifestealer's regen rate. Increases cast range to 500 and reduces cooldown to 20 seconds.
shard_desc: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration. Deals 2% of the target's max health per attack on the target from real heroes. After receiving %damage_threshold% damage, the Open Wounds fester and spread to a non-infected random enemy within %spread_radius% radius

scepter_desc: Causes Ion Shell to have 2 Charges, increases duration by 20 seconds and provides +275 Health.
shard_desc: Passive cooldown attack. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock an illusion out of the victim and stun them for up to 2.25 seconds, 350 distance and 300 magic damage based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3 seconds. Max power is reached after 900 distance moved. Illusions lasts for 8 seconds. Cooldown: 14

scepter_desc: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.
shard_desc: Causes Skeleton Walk to create two Burning Army Skeletons.

scepter_desc: Increases duration, provides Status Resist, radius becomes global and affects buildings.
shard_desc: Greatly degenerates the movement capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

scepter_desc: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 3 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 200.
shard_desc: Adds 3 permanent Nature's Attendants that follow Enchantress around.

scepter_desc: Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range.
shard_desc: Causes Inner Fire to apply a 40%% movement speed slow and heal Huskar for 50% of the damage dealt to heroes. Lowers cooldown by 3 seconds. Can be cast while disabled.

scepter_desc: Causes Void to be an AoE ability. Increases the mini-stun duration.
shard_desc: Night Stalker can cast Hunter in the Night. Consumes a creep, instantly killing it and restoring 35% of Night Stalker's maximum HP and and 25% of maximum mana. Cannot target ancients during the daytime. Cooldown: 20

scepter_desc: Broodmother creates a 900 width invisible web line. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will make it visible and become rooted, visible in fog and receive 100dps for 4 seconds, after which the line is destroyed. Broodmother's team is notified in the Minimap whenever someone trips in a Web line. Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed. Can only have 5 Snares Active. Can be cast from anywhere as long as it touches an existing web. Formation Delay: 2, Cast Range: 600, Slow Duration: 0.25, Slow: 100%, Root Duration: 4, DPS: 100
shard_desc: Causes Silken Bola to be a 550 AoE spell and increases the miss chance to 80%

scepter_desc: Upgrades Shuriken Toss. Applies Jinada to it and increases cast range.
shard_desc: Shadow Walk grants you 35% damage reduction while invisible. Attacking out of invisibility stuns the target for 1 second. Lowers cooldown by 5 seconds.

scepter_desc: Allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.
shard_desc: Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds. Causes The Swarm to latch onto and reveal invisible units. Causes Geminate attack to launch on other enemies within 1200 range of the target that have Beetles attached to them.

scepter_desc: Increases Macropyre distance by +400 range, duration by +20 seconds and causes it to become Pure damage and pierce Spell Immunity.
shard_desc: Stuns enemies for %stun_duration% seconds and applies a frost debuff that slows enemy movement speed by %movement_slow%%% and take %base_damage% plus %pct_health_damage%%% of their max health per second as damage for %duration% seconds.

scepter_desc: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within range. The secondary target is tethered to the first.
shard_desc: Flaming Lasso no longer disarms you. Your attacks apply 1 stack of Sticky Napalm.

scepter_desc: Hand of God Applies a Strong Dispel to all allies.
shard_desc: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps. Can control up to 1/2/3 Ancient Creeps based on Hand of God's level.

scepter_desc: Allows Spectre to perform a single target unit Haunt. Casts a Spectral Dagger on the target.
shard_desc: Causes dispersion to fire a spectral dagger every 300 damage absorbed in the direction of the last source of damage. Can fire a maximum of one dagger every 7 seconds and only triggers off player based damage within 700 range

scepter_desc: Removes cooldown and reduces manacost by half.
shard_desc: Causes Ice Vortex to deal 40 DPS and reduces attack speed by 20.

scepter_desc: Doom applies Break and increases duration by 6 seconds.
shard_desc: Infernal Blade stun duration is increased from 0.6 to 1.2 seconds. If the enemy's level is a multiple of 3, or above level 24, they will be stunned for an additional 0.6 seconds and take 150 bonus damage.

scepter_desc: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.
shard_desc: Causes Earthshock to apply a 1.5 second Enrage buff on yourself.

scepter_desc: Reduces Charge of Darkness cooldown, cast point and makes it pierce magic immunity.
shard_desc: Causes Nether Strike to deal 200 extra damage, and apply a 4-second break. Grants you Spell Immunity for 2 seconds.

scepter_desc: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units near Gyrocopter. Prioritizes furthest unit away within its range.
shard_desc: Homing Missiles now constantly fire a rocket barrage with a 725 AOE after 1 second of being cast. Barrage prioritizes the homing missile target.

scepter_desc: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.
shard_desc:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them %attack_speed% Attack Speed, %move_speed% Movement Speed and %hp_regen% HP regen.

Lasts %duration% seconds.

scepter_desc: Creates a Cataclysm when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a 90 second cooldown. Creates 2 visible Sun Strikes within 160-200 range of each enemy hero. Additionally Increases the level of Quas, Wex and Exort by 1.
shard_desc: Causes two extra Chaos Meteors to land alongside the primary cast at slight angles. Reduces cooldown by 15 seconds.

scepter_desc: Causes Last Word to become an AoE ability.
shard_desc: Causes Glaives to bounce once towards the closest enemy unit, dealing 50%% of Silencer's attack damage. Bounce range is 600. Additionally, it increases the Intelligence stolen per kill by 2.

scepter_desc: Grants charges to Astral Imprisonment, increases damage by 140 and applies the damage in an area.
shard_desc: Grants an additional +5% Mana Capacity steal to Astral Imprisonment. Also allows allies to move at 60% movement speed during Astral Imprisonment (they are visible, but untargettable and can't perform any other actions).

scepter_desc: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain %lifesteal_percent%%% Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within %lifesteal_range% range of each other.
shard_desc: Causes one of your creep waves to include one uncontrollable wolf that moves with the wave. Additionally, wolves spawned this way may Cripple towers

scepter_desc: Primal Split has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time. Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown.
shard_desc: Primal Split now creates a Void brewling. Has Astral Pulse ability, affecting enemies in 500 AoE. Applies a 20/30/40% slow and Disarm for 2 seconds. Also gains Void Brawler stance granting 20% Status Resistance to Brewmaster and applies a 25% Slow for 2s on attack. Slow and Status Resistance are tripled when affected by Cinder Brew.

scepter_desc: Cooldown is removed, replaced with %max_charges% charges that replenish every %charge_restore_time_tooltip_scepter% seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.
shard_desc:
Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration.  At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse. Gains Charges with Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter_desc: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.
shard_desc: Savage Roar now empowers allies in 700 AoE with +20% Movement Speed and +60 Attack Speed for 5 seconds. Applies a basic dispel. Replicates between Lone Druid and Spirit Bear regardless of castability on the other.

scepter_desc: Creates an illusion of allied heroes. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.
shard_desc: Chaos Bolt creates a Phantasm illusion attacking the target for 6 seconds. Increases cast range by 300.

scepter_desc: Channels for 0.75 seconds and digs into the ground for 3.5 seconds, dispelling Meepo and causing him to be come invulnerable and untargetable for %duration%. Restores %hp_restore%%% of his max health over that duration. Canâ€™t be cast while rooted.
shard_desc: Divided we Stand can be cast as long as there's a Meepo within 300 radius of yourself. Causes that Meepo to fling you towards a target within a 900 AoE, dealing 100 damage and slowing their movement speed by 50%. Cooldown 18/16/14s Mana Cost: 100

scepter_desc: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.
shard_desc: Causes you to become invisible with Nature's Guise and root enemies upon attacking. Roots them for 1 second and deals a total of 200 damage. Lasts an extra second when attacking near a tree. Increases movement speed bonus by 15%%.

scepter_desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is %scepter_mana%%% of Ogre Magi's current mana.
shard_desc:
Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing 85%% of the damage of next %attacks% attacks from heroes. Launches fireballs at the attacker, dealing %damage% damage.

Lasts %duration% seconds.

scepter_desc: Increases strength steal.
shard_desc: Reduces Flesh Golem Cooldown by 35s and causes Undying to spawn one zombie on each attack while transformed.

scepter_desc: Increases the number of spells that can be stolen to 2. Increases cast range, and upgrades spells to their Scepter version.
shard_desc: Allows you to target yourself or allies with Telekinesis. Throw range is 85% longer and cooldown is reduced by 30%% when targeting allies. Throw delay reduced to 0.5 seconds.

scepter_desc: Mutes items.
shard_desc: Causes each strike gives a short 1.5 second buff to all allies within radius that provides +25%% Movement Speed and +50 Attack Speed. Increases radius to 650.

scepter_desc: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
shard_desc: Causes Nyx's Vendetta attack to amplify spell damage received by 20%% for 4 seconds. Also increases Vendetta movement speed by 25%.

scepter_desc: Allows Ensnare to target Spell Immune or sleeping units. Reduces the Ensnare cooldown by 6 seconds and increases cast range by 400.
shard_desc: Song of the Siren heals allies by 5% of their Max HP per second for its duration.

scepter_desc: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.
shard_desc: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

scepter_desc: Spirits now passively spawn around Io constantly every second. Max of 5. Spirits colliding with heroes slow them by 15% for 0.3s
shard_desc: Increases Overcharge Spell Amplification by 10%. Io gains 10% Spell Lifesteal and can now share Spell Lifesteal with its tethered target.

scepter_desc: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage 20%% movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal %bonus_damage%%% more damage for %bonus_duration% seconds. Lasts %invis_duration% seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.
shard_desc: Grants Visage the ability to cast Stone Form. Restores up to 35% of your health. Cooldown: 60. Manacost: 125.

scepter_desc: Provides %max_charges% charges and increases pounce range.
shard_desc: Creates a 300 AoE cloud at the target location for %duration% seconds. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance. Cast Range: 800. Cooldown: 75

scepter_desc: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies hit into stone. Stone duration increases with each bounce of the Mystic Snake.
shard_desc: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy. Cooldown: 12.

scepter_desc: Causes Whirling Axes (Melee) to dispel Troll Warlord. Reduces cooldown and manacost.
shard_desc: Global active. Grants all allied heroes %attack_speed% Attack Speed or %status_resistance%%% Status Resistance for %duration% seconds based on whichever stance Troll is currently in. Ranged provides attack speed and melee provides status resistance.

scepter_desc: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs. Enemies affected by stampede are leashed. Increases duration by 1 second.
shard_desc: Causes Double Edge to increase Centaur's strength by 15%% per hero hit for 15 seconds. Duration refreshes per stack. Max 5 Stacks. Slows enemies by 25%% for 2 seconds.

scepter_desc: Increases Shockwave radius by 50 and range by 150. After %scepter_erupt_time% the shockwave line explodes dealing an additional 50% of Shockwave's base damage and reducing enemies's armor and speed by %scepter_slow_pct%%% for %scepter_duration% seconds. Armor and Movement speed is slowly regained over that duration.
shard_desc: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies spend %air_duration% seconds in the air, then take %damage% damage and are heavily slowed for %slow_duration% seconds upon landing.

scepter_desc: Increases Chakram and Secondary Chakram damage per second by %scepter_bonus_damage%.
shard_desc: Releases a %width% width flame that extends %length% range in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals %damage_per_second% damage per second and slows by 30%%. Affects buildings for 40%% damage. Lasts %duration% seconds. Debuff lingers for 2 seconds.

scepter_desc: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range. Increases Stack Limit to %stack_limit_scepter%.
shard_desc: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in a 700 radius with Goo and 2 Quills.

scepter_desc: Kicks the closest enemy unit in a targeted direction, stunning and damaging them. Also deals damage to all heroes within %search_radius% radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by 50% if kicking a creep.
shard_desc: Enemies trapped within an ice shard suffer from 40% slow and take 60 damage per second. Increases Ice Shards depth by 300 units.

scepter_desc: When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within %scepter_radius% range. Heroes will take priority.

Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than %ally_threshold_scepter% damage while within %redirect_range_scepter% range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.
shard_desc: Causes Mist Coil to deal Abaddon's attack damage on impact. Increase Curse of Avernus base slow by 10%%.

scepter_desc: Causes you to become Spell Immune for %scepter_magic_immune_per_hero% seconds per affected enemy hero when the spirit returns to you.
shard_desc: Allows you to switch Echo Stomp to autocast. When cast while on autocast, Elder Titan will take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

scepter_desc: Increases Duel duration, and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take 50% damage from other sources. Reduces cooldown by 20 seconds.
shard_desc: Legion Commander gains 4 armor for every hero hit with Overwhelming Odds and 0.5 armor for each creep. Increases Overwhelming Odds duration by 8 seconds.

scepter_desc: Reactive Tazer can be cast on allies and deals %scepter_damage% damage on detonation.
shard_desc: Increases Blast Off! cast range by 300 and applies a 1.75 second stun to affected enemies.

scepter_desc: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.
shard_desc: Fire Remnants deal 45 damage per second in a 600 AoE around them. If an enemy hero dies within 400 range of Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

scepter_desc:
Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>
Can be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.
Has a larger cast range when cast on an ally hero.
shard_desc: Causes Stone Remnant to provide 375 ground vision. Increases charge count by 4.

scepter_desc: Summons a Pit of Malice around each of the portals. Units in Pit of Malice are slowed by 40%
shard_desc: Firestorm can be self-targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows Underlord around. Increases the wave count by 3. Reduces Wave and Burn intervals and duration by 25%

scepter_desc: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become feared upon impact, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for %scepter_meta_duration% seconds.
shard_desc: Costs %health_cost_pct%%% of Terrorblade's Current HP to cast, dispelling Terrorblade and providing him +%berserk_bonus_movement_speed% Movement and +%berserk_bonus_attack_speed% Attack Speed for %duration% seconds. Provides %melee_bonus%%% more bonus while melee. Cooldown: 14.

scepter_desc: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.
shard_desc: Allows Sun Ray to be cast during Supernova. Slows enemies by 12%.

scepter_desc: Brings forth rain on a %radius% unit area for %duration% seconds. Enemies standing in the area receive %damage% damage per second and have %heal_amp%%% reduced heal amplification. Allies heal %damage% health per second and have %heal_amp%%% increased incoming heal amplification
shard_desc: Causes False Promise to have a 0.15-second fade delay invisibility.

scepter_desc: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.
shard_desc: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1200 range. Reduces cooldown by 4 seconds.

scepter_desc: Causes Spark Wraiths to spawn a new Spark Wraith after impacting an enemy, which then starts its 3 second activation period.
shard_desc: Magnetic Field pushes enemies out of the area when cast, and provides allies in it with +40% Magic Resistance. Slows enemies inside by 30%.

scepter_desc: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby. Soldiers can now gain Jingu Mastery charges independently.
Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.
shard_desc: Cursed Crown creates four brambles around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Reduces stun delay by 1 second.

scepter_desc: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle in every 90 degrees around your hero.
shard_desc: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball for up to 4 seconds, gaining magic immunity and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker for 0.75 seconds, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way. Cooldown: 30

scepter_desc: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is spell immune, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.
shard_desc: Causes Ink Swell to deal 40% more damage and heal the target for 40% of the damage Ink Swell deals. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispell.

scepter_desc: Tosses a boomerang in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a Hunter's Mark that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage and have reduced status resistance.
shard_desc: Hoodwink sends a decoy illusion to the target location.  When the illusion is attacked or hit by a targeted ability, it is destroyed and it throws a lesser bushwhack towards the enemy.

scepter_desc: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain two charges.
shard_desc: Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by %shard_bonus_damage%.

scepter_desc: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit that slows and applies damage over time.
shard_desc: Causes Scatterblast to knock units back in the point blank range for 250 units, dealing 35% extra bonus damage and stunning for 1.4 seconds.

scepter_desc: Creates invulnerable soldiers around Mars' front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his full damage +75 and applying procs. Attacks slow enemies by 30% for 1 second. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.
shard_desc: Spear of Mars impales up to two units and leaves a fire trail behind for 10 seconds. Deals 35 damage per second and slows by 20%%. Debuff lingers for 2 seconds.

scepter_desc: Solar Guardian healing increased, channeling time reduced to 1 second and total duration increased to 6 seconds. Causes allies in the destination area to have 60% evasion while Dawnbreaker is airborne. Solar Guardian can be cast again after take off to land early.
shard_desc: Dawnbreaker gains magic immunity and free movement during Starbreaker.

scepter_desc: Reduces Unleash Cooldown by 10 seconds. While Unleash is Active, all of Marci's abilities unleash pulses when cast.
shard_desc: Rebound can be set to autocast to throw the targeted unit instead of rebounding off it.
Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast.
